entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
